name: maxime-pelletier
description:
A versatile, customizable, and library-agnostic carousel system.

Supports multiple content types, such as images from local and remote URLs, PDFs in <embed> tags, or full webpages in <iframe> tags.
Supports styling with a custom stylesheet.

scripts.start: tsc --build && python -m http.server --directory ./example/ && start chrome http://localhost:8000
